mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categories (name, sort_order, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{sortOrder}, datetime('now'), datetime('now'))
mapper.update: UPDATE categories SET name = #{name}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM categories ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.id, c.name, c.sort_order as sortOrder, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt, COUNT(w.id) as appCount FROM categories c LEFT JOIN web_servers w ON c.id = w.category_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.sort_order, c.created_at, c.updated_at HAVING COUNT(w.id) > 0
UNION
SELECT 0 as id, '未分类' as name, 999 as sortOrder, datetime('now') as createdAt, datetime('now') as updatedAt, COUNT(w.id) as appCount FROM web_servers w LEFT JOIN categories c ON w.category_id = c.id WHERE c.id IS NULL HAVING COUNT(w.id) > 0 ) ORDER BY sortOrder ASC, id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE categories SET sort_order = #{sortOrder}, updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE id = #{id}
